CreatePage.title: Create a new page
CreatePage.titleTopLevel: Create a new TOP LEVEL page

EditPage.title: Editing a page
EditPage.deletePageWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this page? All its children pages will be moved to this page's parent.

Feedbacks.S_PAGE_MOVED: Page moved to a new parent
Feedbacks.E_MISSING_DB: Database not connected or connection invalid
Feedbacks.E_WRONG_PARENT_PAGE: Parent page is invalid or not found
Feedbacks.E_INVALID_PARENT_PAGE: Parent page is missing or invalid
Feedbacks.E_REV_MISMATCH_ON_SAVE: Revision mismatch detected. Someone may have changed the content. Please try again.
Feedbacks.E_UPLOAD_DATA_MISSING: Either the URL or the file is missing
Feedbacks.E_UPLOAD_URL_PROBLEMATIC: The URL provided is not valid
Feedbacks.E_USER_NOT_FOUND: No user is known with this email

MovePage.searchNewParent: Search for a new parent (wildcard* allowed)

NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.

PageHistory.noChanges: No changes have been made to this page yet.

ReadPageVersion.oldVersion: You are viewing an old version (number %{version}, from %{date} by %{updatedBy})
ReadPageVersion.oldVersionInfo: The current version is from %{newDate}, by %{newUpdatedBy}. You can view the current version following %{link}, or you can go back to the %{historyLink}
ReadPageVersion.moreInfo: The history only reports changes to the page content and title. Changes on the page's authorship or hierarchy are not tracked at this time.

SettingsPage.title: Edit settings
SettingsPage.siteTitleHelp: This will appear at the very top left corner of the application

PreferencesPage.title: Edit preferences
PreferencesPage.setLanguage: Set the language of the user interface to:
PreferencesPage.textSizeHelp: Applies only to the main content, not the UI

WelcomePage.title: Welcome!
WelcomePage.content: This page is just a placeholder: to get started, add your first page by using the "%{buttonLabel}" button.

ImageDialog.title: Insert an image
ImageDialog.enterUrlHelp: The URL of the image to display, including the https:// prefix
ImageDialog.uploadFileHelp: The file to upload must be an image file (JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG) and must be less than 20MB
ImageDialog.altTextHelp: Please provide a textual description of the image, primarily for accessibility purposes

Login.helpEmail: If we know you, we will send you a magic link to log you in
Login.allGood: All good! Check your email and follow the instructions for immediate access.
Login.emailMagicLinkText: Here is the link to follow to access the website as a logged in user: %{magicLink}
Login.magicLinkInvalid: The link you used is either invalid or expired, but you can always request %{aNewOne}
